sources.title: Wotta Nitemare (1939)
sources.description: Popeye is having a dream. In it, Bluto interupts his and Olive's flirtations with one another and keeps having the upper hand. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/wotta-nitemare-1939/

metadata.Plot: Popeye is having a dream: Bluto takes Olive on a picnic. And even though it's Popeye's dream, Bluto still has the upper hand until spinach time. Popeye finds himself sleepwalking and otherwise acting out the dream.
metadata.Actors: Pinto Colvig, Margie Hines, Jack Mercer
